TextView.android:text: Assistance to Women in Especially Difficult Circumstances (WEDC)

Assistance/services provided to women in especially difficult circumstances who needs immediate response on cases of violence and abuse, and ensures immediate access to appropriate services and provides solutions of their problems.
Women victim-survivor of violence and abuse
Rural Health Unit of the area or any nearest government hospital
Subscribed by Municipal Mayor or Prosecutor’s Office, Malaybalay City
4. Social Case Study Report (1 set original copy)
Municipal Social Welfare & Development Office\nDepEd (Elementary or high school)
Municipal Civil Registrar Office\nMunicipal Social Welfare & Development Office
1.1. Secure victim’s safety by temporary safekeeping and protection at Kitaotao Children and Women Center
2.1. Conducts interview and assessment of needs with Multi-Disciplinary Team (MDT)
3.6. Facilitates temporary safekeeping and protection of victim-survivor at KCWC or government institution
